extendedInfo.description: Taking a road trip and need something to pass the time?  Look no further.  With Road Trip Travel Games you get 4 different games to play with two allowing for up to 6 players to play.  With this app  you get The License Plate Game, The ABC Game, Road Trip Bingo and Scavenger Hunt.  The License Plate Game and Scavenger Hunt are also included as a multiple player game (up to 6 players).  The LITE additio contains Ads.  Look for the non LITE addition if you wish not to have ads.  Have fun and if there is somethin you want added, please contact me and I will do the best I can.

reviews.title: Good app w room for improvement
reviews.comment: This app was fun to play,  but the poor pictures and somewhat amateur interface distracted from the fun. My advice: focus on making 1 of the games really good,  I say the scavenger hunt. Allow users to pick 1 of the sets instead of getting all 90 items, and work on creating more sets with better graphics. Let users input their own names. Good start! :-)  Ps Thanks for adding Canadian licence plates!

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: A great game for family road trips.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome

reviews.title: Boo
reviews.comment: A better review. The app is too hard to use. I would recommend, to try to improve the app, to try using that app in multiplayer mode and see how impossible it is to scroll through the extremely numerous amount of items to check off what your friends have spotted.  There are so many that you don\'t even know what to begin to look for. The whole group would have to memorize the list, then someone would also have to know exactly where that item is to check off. It is not feasible to expect any crowd to use that app effectively with one phone. My best advice to make the game so that it is easy and fun to use. Wouldn\'t take too much effort to figure out how to improve the app.
reviews.author: Pat Kelly
